title: LIOC increases fuel prices again
body_lines: Lanka Indian Oil Company (LIOC) has decided to increase prices of Diesel by Rs 75 per Litre and Petrol by Rs 35 per Litre with effect from midnight today.
Accordingly, Petrol 92-Octane is sold at Rs. 338 while Petrol 95 Octane is sold at Rs. 367.
Auto Diesel is sold at Rs. 289 per Litre and Super Diesel at Rs. 327.
